description:
Whether you are a webOS veteran or new to the webOS user community, the webOS Meetup application will be a great tool for you to connect with webOS users all over the world. 

Community members can find meetups and register for those events from a TouchPad. 

Community organizers can register, create a meetup community and manage that community from within the application all from their Touchpad.

The application allows for bookmarking your favorite meetup communities for quick access to find the next meetup dates.

The developers of this application realize all of this is possible from the web browser built into the TouchPad, but felt an application would be the best way to reach all of the webOS TouchPad users via the webOS Application Catalog.
versionNote: This version offers improved performance and minor bug fixes.
